dialogue.htmlContent:
Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a distressed cry as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, but [npc.sheIs] so exhausted that [npc.she] can't manage to put up any significant amount of resistance.

As you lift the collar up to [npc.her] neck, you see that the ring attached to the front starts to glow green; a clear indication that it's detecting this [npc.race] as a potential enslavement target. Encouraged by the light, you finish what you started, and with a heavy metal 'clink', you clasp the collar around the [npc.race] neck. The [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment instantly recognises [npc.herHim] as being a criminal, and with a purple flash, [npc.sheIs] teleported to the 'Slave Administration' building in Slaver Alley, where [npc.she]'ll be waiting for you to pick them up.

Just before [npc.she] disappears, glowing purple lettering is projected into the air, which reads:

[style.italicsArcane(Slave Registered.
Identification: [npc.nameFull(true)]
Race: [npc.Race])]

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a distressed cry as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, but [npc.sheIs] so exhausted that [npc.she] can't manage to put up any significant amount of resistance.

Forcing the item of clothing onto [npc.herHim], you step back, looking down at a face filled with fear. The [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment recognises the [npc.race] as being a criminal, and with a purple flash, [npc.sheIs] teleported to the 'Slave Administration' building in Slaver Alley, where [npc.she]'ll be waiting for you to pick them up.

Just before [npc.she] disappears, glowing purple lettering is projected into the air, which reads:

[style.italicsArcane(Slave Registered.
Identification: [npc.nameFull(true)]
Race: [npc.Race])]

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a sigh as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, and says, [npc.speech(If you're trying to enslave me, it won't work... I'm already a slave...)]

Ignoring [npc.her] warning, you force the item of clothing onto the [npc.race], before stepping back and waiting to see if anything happens. True to [npc.her] words, however, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment recognises [npc.herHim] as already being a slave, which is evidenced by glowing green lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.boldGreen(Slave already registered!)]

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards v. [npc.She] lets out a mocking laugh as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, and sneers, [npc.speech(If you're trying to enslave me, it's no use! No Enforcer would ever sign off on a demon's enslavement warrant!)]

Ignoring [npc.her] warning, you force the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] onto the [npc.race], before stepping back and waiting to see if anything happens. True to [npc.her] words, however, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment doesn't recognise [npc.herHim] as being a criminal, which is evidenced by glowing red lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.italicsBad(Target not wanted for enslavement!)]

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a mocking laugh as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, and sneers, [npc.speech(If you're trying to enslave me, it's no use! I haven't been targeted by the Enforcers for anything!)]

Ignoring [npc.her] warning, you force the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] onto the [npc.race], before stepping back and waiting to see if anything happens. True to [npc.her] words, however, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment doesn't recognise [npc.herHim] as being a criminal, which is evidenced by glowing red lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.italicsBad(Target not wanted for enslavement!)]

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a distressed cry as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, but [npc.sheIs] so exhausted that [npc.she] can't manage to put up any significant amount of resistance.

Forcing the item of clothing onto [npc.herHim], you step back, looking down at a face filled with fear. Despite the fact that [npc.sheIs] a wanted criminal, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment recognises the fact that you don't have a slaver license, which is evidenced by glowing red lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.italicsBad(Invalid owner! Slaver license required!
Please contact the nearest Enforcer and inform them that this target is a wanted criminal!)]

The [npc.race] lets out a relieved sigh as [npc.she] sees that [npc.sheHas] avoided being enslaved. Not wanting to waste your time trying to hunt down an Enforcer who could deal with this [npc.race], you make a disappointed tutting noise as you step back and wonder what to do next...
